description: Offended by Chisato`s telepathic intrusion into his thoughts, Touno takes his anguish too far and it blossoms into an intense aversion for all espers. Fortunately, it seems that Touno has gotten over Chisato`s intrusion since he has met his athletic rival in his new classmate Kaoru who he suspects used her telekinesis to bean him in the head with an eraser when they first met.
name: Touno Masaru
